channel.title: Grief on Inner Daemons
channel.description: Recent content in Grief on Inner Daemons

item.title: Ellusive Happiness
item.description: Life is strange. The most important things happen in the wrong moments, it seems. One chapter ends, another begins but it feels like nothing it’s in place. There’s something always missing. Something not finished or not completely done. Why wait? I keep telling myself? Why not? Something inside me says “Let go, totally and freely. Don’t be afraid”, nonetheless when I feel so happy and comfortable with a supposedly “wrong situation” the question lingers again: “What should I do then?
